root.name: Linear Programming
root.description:
A open-source utility library for linear programming in Java with the simplex algorithm. Problems are of the type: min/max c*x st. Ax <= b x >= 0
The primal problem is solved using Gauss-Jordan elimination and the lexicographic rule for pivoting is used.
Handles:
- maximization and minimization problems
- equality and inequality constraints
- negative and positive constraint values.
The library can be used by other ICY plugins or called as a standalone Java software for custom problems: java -jar linearProgrammingICY.jar -help for the manual. Sources files are provided in the jar file.
